column1: - ORCA Platform telemetry (4,200 agents across 47 customers)
- Market benchmarks: Gartner AIOps survey (n=340 enterprises)
- Compliance data: Customer audit reports, regulatory filings
- Trust Score: Composite metric (policy alignment 30%, workflow conformance 25%, anomaly accuracy 20%, SLA adherence 15%, audit readiness 10%)
- Risk Avoided: Modeled cost of incidents prevented (regulatory penalties, downtime, data breaches)
- ROI Multiple: (Total Value Delivered) / (ORCA Investment) over 18-month period
- Market Averages: Derived from Gartner AIOps survey + IDC AI Governance study
